item.title: RedisBloom 详解
item.content:encoded:
前言

相关命令

BF.ADD

Syntax

BF.ADD key item

Available in: Redis Stack / Bloom 1.0.0
Time complexity: O(k), where k is the number of hash functions used by the last sub-filter

BF.EXISTS

Syntax

BF.EXISTS key item

Available in: Redis Stack / Bloom 1.0.0
Time complexity: O(k), where k is the number of hash functions used by the last sub-filter

BF.INFO

Syntax

BF.INFO key [CAPACITY | SIZE | FILTERS | ITEMS | EXPANSION]

Available in: Redis Stack / Bloom 1.0.0
Time complexity: O(1)

BF.INSERT

Syntax

BF.INSERT key [CAPACITY capacity] [ERROR error]
  [EXPANSION expansion] [NOCREATE] [NONSCALING] ITEMS item [item
  ...]

Available in: Redis Stack / Bloom 1.0.0
Time complexity: O(k * n), where k is the number of hash functions and n is the number of items

BF.LOADCHUNK

Syntax

BF.LOADCHUNK key iterator data

Available in:

Redis Stack / Bloom 1.0.0

Time complexity:

O(n), where n is the capacity

BF.MADD

Syntax

BF.MADD key item [item ...]

Available in:

Redis Stack / Bloom 1.0.0

Time complexity:

O(k * n), where k is the number of hash functions and n is the number of items

BF.MADD

Syntax

BF.MADD key item [item ...]

Available in:

Redis Stack / Bloom 1.0.0

Time complexity:

O(k * n), where k is the number of hash functions and n is the number of items

BF.MEXISTS

Syntax

BF.MEXISTS key item [item ...]

Available in:

Redis Stack / Bloom 1.0.0

Time complexity:

O(k * n), where k is the number of hash functions and n is the number of items

BF.RESERVE

Syntax

BF.RESERVE key error_rate capacity [EXPANSION expansion]
  [NONSCALING]

Available in:

Redis Stack / Bloom 1.0.0

Time complexity:

O(1)

BF.SCANDUMP

Syntax

BF.SCANDUMP key iterator

Available in:

Redis Stack / Bloom 1.0.0

Time complexity:

O(n), where n is the capacity
